abilities.name: Sadism
abilities.abilityDescription: Alarak deals 100% more Ability damage versus enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Discord Strike
abilities.abilityDescription: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 384 (182 + 4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.abilityDescription: Create a force, pushing yourself and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 106 (50 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 210 (100 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and all enemies between you and the target. 75% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes is returned as health.

abilities.name: Deadly Charge
abilities.abilityDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in the path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

abilities.name: Unleash Deadly Charge
abilities.abilityDescription: Unleash your Deadly Charge.Issuing a move order while this is channeling will cancel the cast at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

abilities.name: Counter-Strike
abilities.abilityDescription: Alarak becomes Protected and channels for 1 second. If an enemy Hero attacked Alarak during that time, Alarak sends a shockwave forward that deals 579 (275 + 4% per level) damage.

skins.name:
Highlord of the Tal'darim
Backstory: Not all heroes are born of altruism... some, like Alarak, simply desire vengeance. As the new Highlord of the Tal'darim, Alarak leads his people to a destiny free of the corrupt influence of the fallen xel'naga, Amon.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: The Highlord's armor serves as both ceremonial adornment and as a conduit of raw power. Adorned with blood shards and fueled by terrazine, it channels Alarak's fury directly into his blades.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Herald of N'zoth
Backstory: The God of the Deep writhes within his prison, thrashing endlessly. Alarak, the Corruptor's Herald, brings word of the Old God's return, preparing all realities for the coming change.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.
Backstory: Should he choose to float only an inch off the ground, you would still be beneath the Highlord.

abilities.name: Timewalker
abilities.abilityDescription: You've traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 1 level earlier than your teammates!

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.abilityDescription: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 855 (406 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 965 (458 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: Time Trap
abilities.abilityDescription: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put into Stasis for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

abilities.name: Slowing Sands
abilities.abilityDescription:
Mana: 2 per second
Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Temporal Loop
abilities.abilityDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

skins.name:
Keeper of Time
Backstory: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation, there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: The vestments of a Bronze Dragon are blessed by a power that exists beyond time and space. They are a fragment of both who Chromie was and who she is still yet to be.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Fel Queen
Backstory: There are an infinite number of timelines and fixing any of them can be a tricky proposition. But this one where Chromie is Queen of the Fel Drakes?, Yeah, that seems worth looking into.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over. Themed Abilities. All spells as well as dance and taunt animations have a fel green tint to them.

skins.name:
Wildhammer Thane
Backstory: Falstad Wildhammer is the High Thane of the Wildhammer Clan and a founding member of the Council of Three Hammers that presides over Ironforge. Despite speculation, Falstad has never been dead and anyone who claims such is a liar.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: Much like other clans and races will don warpaint as they head into battle, the Wildhammer Dwarves will adorn themselves with their gryphon's feathers.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Storm Lord
Backstory: During the War of Three Hammers, no Wildhammer was as feared as the Storm Lords. Their stormhammers forced the Bronzebeards to adopt new weapons and strategies.
Price: $7.49 / 7.49€

Buccaneer
Backstory: To this day, Captain Falstad and the crew of the Wildhammer honor the pirate’s code set by Mistharbour's Council of Three Anchors. Of course, some say those rules are merely guidelines…
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. His Basic Attack fires cannon balls, he throw anchors when using Hammerang or Lightning Rod, and he drops feathers when he uses Barrel Roll or Flight. Many of his abilities have new sound effects.

Twilight's Hammer Chieftain

Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master

Price: $7.49 / 7.49€

abilities.name: Curse of the Worgen
abilities.abilityDescription: Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged.While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage.

abilities.name: Razor Swipe
abilities.abilityDescription:
Swipe towards the area in front of you for 349 (166 + 4% per level) damage.
Human: Gilnean Cocktail
Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.abilityDescription:
Hurl a flask that deals 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 518 (246 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.

Swipe forward and damage enemies you pass through.

abilities.abilityDescription: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

abilities.name: Disengage

Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

abilities.abilityDescription: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing 3 times for 921 (437 + 4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

abilities.name: Marked for the Kill
abilities.abilityDescription: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero in its path for 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage. Each time you deal damage to the Vulnerable Hero, the duration is refreshed.

skins.name:
Lord of the Worgen
Backstory: Like most Gilneans, Genn Greymane is afflicted by the Worgen Curse. Though he feels at fault for his people's ill fate, he has embraced his inner beast without giving in to its feral nature. Now he leads his pack as both their alpha and their king.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: Finery befitting a Gilnean king comes at great cost within the Nexus. Some days it's tooth and nail, others it's an eye for an eye.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Ringmaster
Backstory: Gazlowe and Gallywix always have the Extravaganza's finances in mind. So a Ringmaster that's not only a lion tamer, but also the lion? Well, that's a done deal, my friend.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

skins.name:
Darkness Incarnate
Backstory: Abandoning the ways of shamanism, Gul'dan entered a pact with the demon lord Kil'jaeden and betrayed his people in exchange for limitless power. With the orcish Horde under his master's thrall, both Draenor and Azeroth nearly fell into his grasp.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: With his deception complete, Gul’dan need no longer hide his face beneath a cowl. He is Darkness Incarnate, and all of the Nexus shall behold his true power in the war between shadow and light.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Balespider (Tier 12 Warlock set)
Backstory: The Balespider's Burning Vestments were woven from the cinderwebs of the Red Widow, Beth'tilac. Only by enduring the flames of the Firelands can a Warlock know its searing embrace.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Epic Skin Features: Themed Abilities. Corruption produces a web visual effect on the ground, and releases a number of small spiders.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft tier sets skins.

skins.name:
The Betrayer
Backstory: Illidan Stormrage, the first Demon Hunter, betrayed his people and created a new Well of Eternity after the demonic invasion of Azeroth. Now Illidan lords over Outland slaying unsuitably prepared Heroes who venture into his domain.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: The Blades of Azzinoth had served Illidan as dutiful companions while he tracked his prey across the Nexus... perhaps these Man'ari warplates would as well, in time.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Lunar
Backstory: For most of the year, Illidan loathes druidic customs. But during the Lunar Festival, even he sets aside old grudges and joins his brother in honoring the departed elders of the Stormrage family.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Dive and Sweeping Strike drop coins, Metamorphosis sets off fireworks and gives him a golden demon form, and The Hunt marks its target with a golden dragon. His mask changes as he takes damage.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

Shan'do
Backstory: Stormrage was born with amber eyes; a sign of great destiny... But as he learned from Cenarius, his brother grew distant. Still, none expected Malfurion's betrayal.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Dive, Sweeping Strike, Metamorphosis, and The Hunt have nature-themed animations.[3]
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft alternative shared history skins.

Spectre
Backstory: As the terrazine haze cleared from his mind, Illidan saw what he had become. His body had mutated, grown irreversibly addicted... But the power was worth any price.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Dive, Sweeping Strike, Metamorphosis, and The Hunt have StarCraft-themed animations.[3]
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into StarCraft skins.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.abilityDescription: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.abilityDescription: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

abilities.name: Cone of Cold
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 504 (204 + 4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.abilityDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 680 (323 + 4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

abilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilities.abilityDescription: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

skins.name:
Archmage
Backstory: Once the apprentice of the Archmage Antonidas, Jaina Proudmoore led the survivors of Lordaeron to Kalimdor and founded the city of Theramore. Now, she serves the Alliance as a powerful voice fighting for reason and diplomacy.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master (Tier 1 Mage set)
Backstory: First worn by the great champions who ventured into the Molten Core to defeat Ragnaros, the Arcanist Regalia has become a symbol of mages who have mastered the Arcane.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft tier sets skins.

Winter Veil
Backstory: The weather outside is frightful. Although, to be fair, Jaina has been casting Blizzard a LOT out there.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€ (only available during Winter Veil event)
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Winter Veil Jaina's Blizzard is snowflake-themed, and her Water Elemental is a snowman.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.
skins.price: Price: $9.99 / 8.99€ (only available during Winter Veil event)

skins.name:
Tempest Regalia (Tier 6 Mage set)
Backstory: The Tempest Regalia's origins have been lost to time, but rumor has it Tydormu of the Bronze Dragonflight may impart its secrets... for the right price.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft tier sets skins.

Lunar
Backstory: In recent years, all of Azeroth has celebrated the yearly Lunar Festival in honor of their elders. Jaina is no exception. In times when the future is uncertain, it's important to honor the past.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Frostbolt and Cone of Cold create coins, Blizzard and Ring of Frost are Lunar Festival-themed, and her Water Elemental wears a dragon mask.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.abilityDescription: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.abilityDescription: After 1 second, deal 702 (302 + 4% per level) damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 553 (252 + 4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 303 (138 + 4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.abilityDescription: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyroblast
abilities.abilityDescription: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 2150 (851 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 1075 (426 + 4% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

abilities.name: Phoenix

skins.name:
The Sun King
Backstory: Like all Blood Elves, Prince Kael'thas was transformed by the fall of Quel'thalas. Desperate to save his people from being consumed by their magical addiction, he joined forces with the Burning Legion and now lords over Tempest Keep.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: Only the finest of robes and armor may adorn the Sun King. His majesty and brilliance must shine forth like the sun itself.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

StormPunk
Backstory: On some worlds, technology and magic are not so different. Those who master both, like Lord Kael'thas, can create both wonders and terrors beyond your imagination.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Cyberhawk
Backstory: Sunstrider Industries CEO Mikael Thoss uses his company's vast wealth and cutting edge technology to protect the innocent as Cyberhawk, the avian avenger!
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities.

skins.name:
Queen of Blades
Backstory: Once a terran ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: The primal zerg essences within Kerrigan cannot remain static for too long. With every kill, they incorporate their foe's strengths, becoming increasingly deadly... and spikey.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Succubus
Backstory: Kerrigan, the Queen of Suffering, rules over her brood of succubi with a fel iron fist. Warlocks brash enough to summon her risk facing her terrible vengeance.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

Countess
Backstory: Countess Sarah von Kerrigan's bloodthirst knew no bounds. It was only a matter of time before the Vampire Slayers of Raven Court rose up against her reign of terror.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed mount, themed abilities. The skin's Impaling Blades resemble iron stakes, and she gains access to Bat Transformation.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Raven Court skins.

Queen of Ghosts
Backstory: Fully cleansed by the Xel'Naga Artifact, Kerrigan joined forces with Jim Raynor and Prince Valerian. Armed with the latest Umojan tech, they prepare to bring Arcturus to justice once and for all.
Price: $14.99 / 13.99€.
Legendary Skin Features: Themed abilities, replaced voice-over.
Backstory: It's Heroes of the Storm Trivia Time™! Did you know that the Countess Kerrigan doesn't transform into a vampire bat, but rather a fruit bat instead? Talk about bananas!

abilities.name: Critical Mass
abilities.abilityDescription: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of your Abilities.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 266 (151 + 3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire an orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 244 (135 + 3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. The amount of damage dealt is increased the further it travels, up to 732 (405 + 3% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.abilityDescription: Teleport a short distance instantly.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.abilityDescription: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 467 (185 + 5% per level) damage per second to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: Wave of Force
abilities.abilityDescription: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 425 (168 + 5% per level) damage.

skins.name:
Rebellious Wizard
Backstory: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: Once, only wizards who had spent countless hours braving the inferno were able to attain the fabled archon armor. Those who adorned it were both respected and feared. Then came transmog...
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Star Princess
Backstory: For eons, Earth has been protected by the magical Star Princesses. Together, they stand against the evil Eternal Empire and its Space Lords in the name of love and friendship.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed Abilities. Magic Missiles and Arcane Orbs are shaped like stars. Teleport, Disintegrate, Wave of Force, and Hearthstone also create stars when used.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Eternal Empire skins.

Striker
Backstory: Li-Ming is an avid student of magic, but it was her skills on the court that scored her a scholarship at the Yshari Sanctum. As team captain, she intends to lead the Vizjerei Fireflies to victory.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. All her spells launch volleyballs, and she plays with a ball when hearthing.

skins.name:
First Daughter of Cenarius
Backstory: While her younger sisters frolicked in idyllic forests, Lunara watched as mortals exploited nature's splendor. On Azeroth, her father Cenarius forbade her from retaliating. But this is the Nexus, and it's time for nature to take its revenge.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: As her power grew, Lunara began to hear the wilds of the Nexus crying out for a champion. They granted her untold power, and she granted them ruthless protection.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Sentinel
Backstory: Lunara watched as the betrayer Malfurion's fel magic consumed her beloved wilds. When High Priestess Shadowsong called upon the dryads to join the Sentinels, she was the first to volunteer.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative shared history skins.

skins.name:
Dominion Ghost
Backstory: November "Nova" Terra is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught within her crosshairs.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: The Crius Stealthsuit was the ultimate hostile environment suit developed by the Terran Dominion for its ghost. Unfortunately, due to its immense cost, few were ever deployed.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Spectre
Backstory: Nova couldn't let Tosh face his fate alone, and together they embraced the spectre program. It was her and him against the whole damn universe... just the way she liked it.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Basic Attack, Pinning Shot, Triple Tap, and Precision Strike have altered, orange animations, while Snipe has a green one.

Roller Derby
Backstory: Kate "Supernova" Dennings doesn't take any crap from her rivals on the track. Why should the Nexus be any different?
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed animations. Roller Derby Nova skates around instead of running.

Novazon
Backstory: Hailing from the Skovos Isles, the Askari, or Amazons, are skilled combatants. The young warrior Nova is an expert sharpshooter; eager to make her mark on the world.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
ESkin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Novazon Nova throws a spear when using Snipe, and fires a flaming arrow when using Pinning Shot. Her decoys look like magical illusions rather than technological holograms.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Diablo skins.

Widowmaker
Backstory: Once, she once led a normal life... But now, after intense neural reconditioning, she is one of the most effective assassins still alive. Oh, and this skin makes her look like Widowmaker.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Snipe has a red and purple animation. Pinning Shot looks like Widowmaker's Venom Mine. Triple Tap is purple and creates a purple cylinder around the target. Precision Strike is purple and creates a different symbol when it strikes.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Overwatch skins.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.abilityDescription: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to unleash your full power. You replace the Fort or Keep temporarily, gain new Abilities, and have 4156 Health that burns away over 18 seconds. When your Health is fully depleted, you return to your original form.

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.abilityDescription: Your next Basic Attack is instant, deals moderate damage in an area, and heals you for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Molten Swing (Molten Core Form)
abilities.abilityDescription:
Swing your hammer in a wide arc, dealing moderate damage and stunning enemies for 1 second.
Damage increased by 75% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

abilities.name: Living Meteor
abilities.abilityDescription: Summon a meteor at the target point that deals light damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing massive damage over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Meteor Shower (Molten Core Form)
abilities.abilityDescription:
Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals moderate damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.
Damage increased by 75% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

abilities.name: Blast Wave
abilities.abilityDescription: Ignite yourself or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds, then causing a fiery explosion that deals light damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Explosive Rune (Molten Core Form)
abilities.abilityDescription:
Create a rune in the target area. After 2 seconds the rune explodes, dealing moderate damage to non-Structure enemies.
Damage increased by 75% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

abilities.name: Sulfuras Smash
abilities.abilityDescription: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area. It lands after 0.75 seconds, dealing moderate damage. Enemies in the center take triple damage and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Lava Wave
abilities.abilityDescription: Release a wave of lava from your Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing massive damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 33% versus Heroes.

Renegade Commander

Master

Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Stars and Stripes
Backstory: While the United States Space Force successfully rescued their colonists from the Koprulu sector, Colonel James Raynor worried those monsters might find their way to Earth.

Commander

Marshal
Backstory: Once the Confederacy mined Mar Sara dry of resources, the colonists became desperate. Marshal James E. Raynor found himself alone, trying to keep the peace on a world in chaos.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Basic Attack and Penetrating Round have new animations and sound effects, while Inspire and Adrenaline Rush become sheriff's badge-themed.

Backstory: There are no clans in the New Horde, but Samuro will not abandon the Burning Blade. Adorned in his family's ancestral armor, he will fight under both banners until his clan's honor is restored.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Hellblade
Backstory: The Blackrock chieftain is dead and the Doomhammer has been stolen. Samuro may have failed to protect his master, but he has sworn to exact vengeance upon the Warlord of the Ashwolf clan.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative shared history skins.

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.abilityDescription: Quest: Nearby Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and Heroes drop 5 Fresh Meat when they die. You can pick up Fresh Meat to gain 1 Basic Attack damage per Meat. Can hold up to 125 Meat. You drop up to 10 Fresh Meat upon dying. Reward: After acquiring 125 pieces of Fresh Meat, gain and additional 100 Basic Attack damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. You also no longer lose Fresh Meat on death.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 49.92% fading over 2 seconds. Your next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done for 5 seconds. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Last 4 seconds. Your Basic Attacks against a branded Hero increase the duration by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.abilityDescription: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.abilityDescription: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.abilityDescription: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.

skins.name:
Flesh Carver
Backstory: An unrelenting hacking echoed off the walls of the Cathedral and as Prince Aidan made his way through the depths, the sound only grew louder. There were no screams; just that dreadful sound... over and over.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: An executioner's hood hides their identity and discourages offended parties from seeking revenge. Of course, that won't be a problem for the Butcher.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Iron
Backstory: There are many Butchers within the Burning Hells, but only those who serve Duriel, the Lord of Pain, bolt plates of burning iron to their flesh.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

The Butcherlisk
Backstory: Abathur's newest creation was inspired by the tenacity of the hellish abominations he encountered in the Nexus. Its instructions were simple: Acquire fresh essence. Evolve.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Fresh Meat drops are chunks of green biomass. Hamstring causes green acid to erupt from the ground. Butcher's Brand is green. Ruthless Onslaught displays an image of the Butcherlisk's head with a green aura over the target. Furnace Blast explodes into green acid. Lamb to the Slaughter creates a Spine Crawler that chains targets with a clawed tentacle.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into StarCraft skins.

abilities.name: Frostwolf Resilience
abilities.abilityDescription: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 660 (314 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 391 (186 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and half that amount to 2 nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.abilityDescription: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 336 (160 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy Hero, the wolf stops and roots that hero in place for 1 second.

abilities.name: Windfury
abilities.abilityDescription: Increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Your next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster.

abilities.name: Sundering
abilities.abilityDescription: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.abilityDescription: Summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 2 seconds. Each pulse slows all enemies in the area by 70%, and deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes . Does 3 pulses.

skins.name:
Warchief of the Horde
Backstory: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: The vestments of a shaman should be as simple as the elements themselves. Although, there's no rule about what you wear beneath them.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Hellhammer
Backstory: Go'el, the new Warlord of the Ashwolf clan, lifted the shattered Doomhammer from the Blackrock chieftain’s corpse. Of his father’s betrayers, only Gul'dan remained.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative shared history skins.

Earthbreaker
Backstory: The weight of the world hangs upon the Aspect of Earth, a burden no mortal can bear. As Thrall embraced its power, he was consumed by living rock and forever changed.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Earthbreaker Thrall's Chain Lightning looks like a stream of fire, his Feral Spirit are made of rock, and his Earthquake creates a different symbol on the ground.

skins.name:
Agent of Overwatch
Backstory: Lena Oxton (call sign: "Tracer"), is both an adventurer and an irrepressible force for good. With the ability to alter her own time at will, she fights the good fight wherever she goes -- even the Nexus. Don't worry, loves. The cavalry's finally here.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€, or free with the purchase of Overwatch: Origins Edition.

skins.name:

Backstory: While terrazine exposure greatly enhances psionic powers, Tracer's ability to manipulate her own space-time is considered a unique gift even among her fellow Spectres.

skins.name:
Notorious Outlaw
Backstory: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and even bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a whiskey or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: Sure, that suit may be his prison... But you and I both know that's not going to stop him from sprucing the thing up... Now, is it?
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Infested
Backstory: Maybe keeping that visor open on Char wasn't the best idea...
Price: $14.99 / 12.99€
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over, themed abilities, themed animations. Infested Tychus has a green Overkill animation, throws a baneling when using Frag Grenade, and produces green smoke when he uses Run and Gun. His Odin and Laser Drill are Zerg-infested.

Prisoner
Backstory: They say no one has ever escaped from New Folsom Prison. Wasn't too long ago that they were still right.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over.

abilities.name: Hatred
abilities.abilityDescription: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Last 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire an arrow that deals 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.abilityDescription: Dash to the target area. Your next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 5% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.abilityDescription: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 132 (63 + 4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.abilityDescription: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 493 (234 + 4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and you gain 4 Mana per second.

skins.name:
Demon Hunter
Backstory: Valla witnessed the ferocity of hellspawn firsthand as the demons ravaged her village and left her for dead. Now, with no people to call her own, her only allegiance is to her cause: to rid Sanctuary of the demonic filth corrupting its lands.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: Demon hunters share few traditions as each walks their own unique path... but a master passing on their armor, is an honor few refuse. Valla would wear Josen's mantle with pride.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Vampire Slayer
Backstory: The Countess's thirst for blood could not be quenched even by her death. As the vampire swarm spread across Raven Court, a group of survivors rose up to resist them.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Raven Court skins.

Angelic
Backstory: Inarius was dead, and his disciples would be forever changed. Hatred burned within Valla's angelic heart, but she knew, if it could be tempered, it would be a powerful weapon.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Multishot and Vault have golden animations.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Deputy
Backstory: No one settled disputes on the lawless streets of Riskville faster than Valla de Hunter. When Marshal Raynor began to deputize a posse, she was the first gunslinger on his list.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed animations. Themed abilities. Hungering Arrow fires a giant bullet. Multishot fires a barrage of bullets. Dust is kicked up when she uses Vault. Rain of Vengeance's marker has a sheriff badge theme, and it drops exploding wooden barrels into the targeted area.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Riskville skins.

skins.name:
High King of the Alliance
Backstory: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.
Price: 15,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: The Lion has long been associated with the nation of Stormwind and the House of Wrynn. It is a symbol of courage, dignity and ferocity; truly befitting for the High King.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Lo'Gosh
Backstory: After awakening on the shores of Durotar, the gladiator known as Lo'Gosh became a star of the Crimson Ring Arena. Rumor has it that he fights with the fury of the Ghost Wolf himself.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Themed Abilities.

skins.name:
Dark Prelate
Backstory: The enigmatic Dark Templar Zeratul faithfully serves the Xel'Naga. While he expertly wields the powers of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's greatest leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: Upon selection, each Dark Prelate is presented with a unique armor reflecting their beliefs and personality. Zeratul rarely dons the Shadow's Embrace, as he prefers less formal attire.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

High Templar
Backstory: Despite Judicator Raszagal's warning that only heresy comes from contact with the Dark Ones, Praetor Zeratul believes that the young Prelate "Tassadar" may be the key to Aiur's salvation.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Ronin
Backstory: After failing to protect his lord from the Lenassa clan, Zeratul severed his nerve cords and his connection to his home. Now he wanders, searching for a way to atone for his sins.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Ronin Zeratul's Cleave effect is red. His Singularity Spike is a shuriken. His Blink produces tree leaves, and briefly leaves behind a small wooden log.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Zerg Hunter
Backstory: The Zer'atai clan of Dark Templar are renowned hunters. For nearly a millennium, they have wandered Shakuras, fashioning intricate armors from the very bones of their prey.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Zerg Hunter Zeratul's Singularity Spike is a bladed projectile followed by a trail of purple slime. His Blink produces purple smoke and briefly leaves behind a Zerg symbol.

skins.name:
Evolution Master
Backstory: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: Evolution is a process that's unending. Survival requires adaptation. Even Abathur, a master of manipulating evolution itself, is no exception to this cardinal rule of nature.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Pajamathur
Backstory: Upon occasion reality appears unsuitable. Desire for absence occurs. Inhibit ocular reception. Internally visualize. Possible for current location to alter. Make dreams come true.
Price: $14.99 / 14.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Pajamathur's Locusts wear toy trains on their backs. His Symbiote wears the head of a stuffed bunny like a mask.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of pajama skins.

Skelethur
Backstory: Exoendoskeleton... logical next advancement. Secondary benefit, elicits fear in adolescent terrans. Useful.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Skelethur's Locusts have bone plates and exposed brains on their backs. His Symbiote is a skull with tendrils and an exposed brain.

Mana: 16 per second
Channel a death beam on an enemy dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage per second. Does 25% more damage to Structures.

abilities.abilityDescription: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

skins.name:
Lord of Sin
Backstory: The Lord of Sin rules over a densely populated land of hell where both the greatest joys and despair, and the deepest depravities can be experienced. But it is never enough for Azmodan, who has set his eyes on the realm of Sanctuary.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: The Demon Lord Azmodan is no stranger to opulence and grandeur. In fact, greed and pride are among his favorite sins.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

AzGul'dan
Backstory: Gul'dan could feel the demon's blood coursing through his veins... Mannoroth's gift once set the orcs on their path, now Azmodan's gift would make them unstoppable.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. AzGul'dan's fire effects are green instead of red-orange (tying into the depiction of demonic fire in the Warcraft series), and his demonic minions are green as well (making them resemble orcs).
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

Azmodunk
Backstory: In the deepest recesses of the Inferno lies the Burning Court, a realm with a single edict set by the first Hoop-Lord: "Though shalt slam with the best, or thou jammest with the rest."
Price: $14.99 / 13.99€. Players that attend the Heroes of the Dorm Heroic Four and Grand Finals, or stay in the top 500 bracket challenge for Heroes of the Dorm, won the bundle for free.
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over, themed abilities, custom portrait.[5] Globe Of Annihilation looks like a basketball and creates a net when it hits. General of Hell and Demon Warriors emerge from lockers. All Shall Burn's beam comes out of a basketball. Demonic Invasion plays basketball music and summons basketball-throwing Demonic Grunts. Black Pool has a basketball pattern. He also dunks a ball when hearthing, and wears shoes when using Flames of Wrath.[6]
skins.price: Price: $14.99 / 13.99€. Players that attend the Heroes of the Dorm Heroic Four and Grand Finals, or stay in the top 500 bracket challenge for Heroes of the Dorm, won the bundle for free.

skins.name: Backstory: As the Lord of Sin, Azmodan can draw upon each of its various vices. Once his wrath is unleashed, there are few creatures that can outrun it.

abilities.name: Salvager
abilities.abilityDescription: Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop scrap. Collecting scrap restores 30 Mana and causes your Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3.07 seconds. Activate Salvager to dismantle a traget Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

abilities.name: Deth Lazor
abilities.abilityDescription: Charged attack that deals 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.abilityDescription: Places a bomb that deals 511 (243 + 4% per level) ddamage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.abilityDescription: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage.

skins.name:
Boss of Ratchet
Backstory: Few would consider Gazlowe a fighter, but what he lacks in height, he makes up in mechanical know-how. Besides, you don't get to be boss of a "boom"-town like Ratchet with just a charming personality, if you know what I mean.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: A wise man once said, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it." Gazlowe has never heard of this man... and if he had, he might punch him in the gut for saying stuff like that.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Big Top
Backstory: So they think Gazlowe and Gallywix's Splendiferous Extravaganza has lost its edge, huh? Yeah, well... I got a new act in mind... This one'll knock 'em dead. Guaranteed.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Big Top Gazlowe's turrets have wind-up mechanisms and top hats. His Deth Lazor shoots confetti.

Mad Martian
Backstory: From the martian landscape, Gazlowe gazed upon the Earth with jealous eyes. Soon that glittering sapphire would be his... but first, Super Sonya must be dealt with.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Epic Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Mad Martian Gazlowe's turrets look like flying saucers piloted by floating brains. His Deth Lazor fires in a coiled pattern.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Earth vs Mars skins.

R2: Grav-O-Bomb 3000.

abilities.name: Raven Form
abilities.abilityDescription: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.abilityDescription: Launch a rift that deals 208 (190 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.abilityDescription: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.abilityDescription: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Poly Bomb
abilities.abilityDescription: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Ley Line Seal
abilities.abilityDescription: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.

skins.name:
The Last Guardian
Backstory: Under the demon lord Sargeras's influence, Medivh opened the Dark Portal and unleashed the Horde upon Azeroth. To atone for this sin, he rallied a new generation of heroes to stand against the Burning Legion. Now, he takes this place amongst legends.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: For ages, Atiesh has been passed down from one Guardian of Tirisfal to the next. With the power of the Nexus, Medivh has attuned himself to the staff like none before him.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Knight Owl
Backstory: The Prophets of Kharazania foresaw the Eternal Empire's invasion, but their warning came too late. Medivh, the last Knight Owl, has sworn to prevent the Earth from suffering a similar fate.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed Abilities. Raven Form turns him into an owl, his Portals have an altered appearance, Poly Bomb sheep have blue wings, and Ley Line Seal creates a symbol on the ground.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Eternal Empire skins.

abilities.name: Spawn Egg
abilities.abilityDescription: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, you respawn at the Egg after 5 seconds. If your egg is killed, you are revealed to enemies for 15 seconds. You only grant 25% of a Hero's experience upon dying.

abilities.name: Slime
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 180 (86 + 4% per level) damage and applies Slime on nearby enemies for 8 seconds, slowing enemies by 20%. Does 450 (214 + 4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

abilities.name: Pufferfish
abilities.abilityDescription: Spit out a Pufferfish at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 855 (406 + 4% per level) damage. Enemies can attack the fish to prevent it from exploding.

abilities.name: Safety Bubble
abilities.abilityDescription: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, you cannot attack or use abilities.

abilities.name: March of the Murlocs
abilities.abilityDescription: Command a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 209 (99 + 0% per level) damage and slow its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Does half damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Octo-Grab
abilities.abilityDescription: Summon an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3.06 seconds while you hit them for 1 damage a second.

skins.name:
Baby Murloc
Backstory: Mrgglglbrlg rmrmgllg mrggggm. Mrrglglgy, mgllglgl mgggrrmgl? MRGGGLGLLM! Mrrggllgggllggll mrrglrlg mrrg mrrg mrrrg.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: Do you live on land? Would you be more comfortable in water? Well now, with Murky's new conch-filtration device, you can stay wet, AND smell like crustaceans! Win win!
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Grunty
Backstory: Alright, fess up... Who put the murloc in that power armor? Sammy? We talked about this... Guys, this is real cute and all, but how the heck are we supposed to get him out of there?
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Grunty Murky spawns from a bunker. His Slime looks like oil and contains mechanical parts. His Pufferfish is a Zerg larva. March of the Murlocs summons murlocs in marine armor.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into StarCraft skins.

Funny Bunny
Backstory: Noblegarden is an important time of the year for the inhabitants of Bunny Island. Even murlocs celebrate the festivities, hiding their eggs in the most inconvenient spots possible.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Funny Bunny Murky spawns from an easter egg. He breaks an egg to produce egg white (and yolk) for his Slime ability. His Pufferfish is made of candy. March of the Murlocs summons murlocs with bunny outfits. The shark from Octo-Grab's "... And A Shark Too!" talent is replaced by a candy bunny head on a stick.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

abilities.abilityDescription: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 145 (69 + 0% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds. If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, you permanently gain 4 Health and 1 Mana. Bonus Health: 4. Bonus Mana: 1.

abilities.abilityDescription: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 77 (37 + 4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Zombie Wall
abilities.abilityDescription: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 62 (30 + 4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Plague of Toads
abilities.abilityDescription: Create 5 Toads that deal 277 (132 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Gargantuan Stomp
abilities.abilityDescription: Order your Gargantuan to stomp, dealing 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Gargantuan
abilities.abilityDescription: Summon a Gargantuan that guards you for 20 seconds. Deals 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies when summoned, attacks for 428 (203 + 4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp.

abilities.name: Ravenous Spirit
abilities.abilityDescription: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 412 (196 + 4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

skins.name:
Heretic Witch Doctor
Backstory: With cabalistic incantations and vestments of feather and bone, the Witch Doctor Nazeebo calls upon spirits from the Unformed Land to aid him. Few outlanders encounter a Witch Doctor in the flesh, without losing their own.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: The Hellflame Mask was created in honor of Nazeebo's victory over the Prime Evil. Trusting no one else to guard the black soulstone, he kept it close... Perhaps, too close.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Grimskull
Backstory: The Teganze jungles hold many powerful weapons wielded by both man and demon alike. The Grimskull Visage has been passed down from one Witch Doctor to the next since the Sin War.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€

Harlequin
Backstory: The Countess Kerrigan's demands for entertainment mirror the darkness within her. Her harlequins are masters at manipulating life and death, solely for her amusement.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. The zombies summoned by Harlequin Nazeebo's Zombie Wall wear harlequin outfits, as does his Gargantuan and his Ravenous Spirit.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Raven Court skins.

skins.name:
Siege Tank Operator
Backstory: Sergeant Bama "the Hammer" Kowalski has served some of the toughest tours around the Koprulu sector. The roar of her siege tank's shock cannon strikes fear right into the heart of the toughest of warriors... including some of her allies.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: With as many kills as she'd racked up on the battlegrounds of the Nexus, Sgt. Hammer deserved her promotion to Master Sergeant... even if she promoted herself.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

War World
Backstory: The battle has raged across War World III for years. No one remembers who fired the first shot, but Sgt. Bama the Hammer is fully confident she'll be the one firing the last.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. War World mines have a different model, as does the rocket fired by the Blunt Force Gun.

Sgt. Doomhammer
Backstory: The Iron Demolisher is the pride of the orcish war machine. Sgt. Grimina Doomhammer was given the honor of piloting it in recognition of her years of service in the Arathi Basin battlefield.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Her mines looks like barrels containing miniature iron stars, her napalm is Horde-themed, and her Blunt Force Gun fires a massive iron star. Many of her abilities have new sound effects.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

skins.name:
The Banshee Queen
Backstory: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€ (free for players recruited by Recruit a Friend upon reaching player level 10)
skins.price: Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€ (free for players recruited by Recruit a Friend upon reaching player level 10)

skins.name:
Master
Backstory: The guise of a Dark Ranger strikes fear into the hearts of their enemies. The guise of the Dark Ranger Queen will send them running for reinforcements...
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Ranger-General
Backstory: The Ranger-Generals are the commanders of the Farstriders of Quel'Thalas. It is their solemn duty to ensure the protection of Silvermoon, or give their life in its defense.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of character's pre-change skins.

Sugar Plum
Backstory: Sugar and spice? Maybe. Everything nice? Not by a long shot.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Withering Fire, Shadow Dagger, Haunting Wave, and Wailing Arrow have new spell effects, and her banshees have fairy wings.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

skins.name:
Triple Trouble
Backstory: The Lost Vikings are back! While they briefly considered retirement after defeating the emperor Tomator, there were only so many polar bears they could wrestle before falling into a Nexus portal seemed like a solid life decision.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: Now sporting the finest equipment a Viking can illegally procure from an evil alien overlord's robot army.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Pajama Party
Backstory: While "Party in Pajamaland" is technically a part of the Expanded Universe, the storyline is still considered a seminal work in the Lost Vikings mythos.
Price: $7.49 / 7.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of pajama skins.

skins.name:
Cryptic Necromancer
Backstory: From the recesses of the eastern jungles comes a man cloaked in mystery. As a member of the secretive Priests of Rathma, or the Necromancers, Xul wields powerful death magic and fights to preserve the delicate balance between order and chaos.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: Cloaked in foreign garb, Xul returned from his fight against the Prime Evils as a Master Necromancer. He chose to mentor only a single apprentice, a promising student named Mehtan.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Serpent King
Backstory: While the Serpent King acted as Pharaoh Ta-sadar's vizier, his true loyalty had always belonged to the Spider Queen. Once he saw his chance, Xul's betrayal was as swift as a serpent's strike.
Price: $7.49 / 7.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Luxoria skins.

Scarecrow
Backstory: Farmer Saldean looked at the empty pole with confusion. Hadn't he hitched up that new Scarecrow? In his bewilderment he missed the words scratched into the dirt, "It's time to harvest."
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Raise Skeleton's magic effect is orange, and the skeletons raised wear Halloween masks. Spectral Scythe is in the shape of his new scythe. Cursed Strikes makes his scythe glow orange and strikes kick up hay and crows. Bone Prison traps heroes with corn stalks and jack-o'-lanterns. Skeletal Mages wear witch hats and Halloween masks. Poison Nova launches jack-o'-lanterns.

skins.name:
Broodmother of the Swarm
Backstory: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her vicious minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: As his Queen ordered, Abathur augmented Zagara, allowing her more flexible thinking and a stronger control over her brood... but there's always room for more improvement.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Insectoid
Backstory: Dr. Wright hypothesized only insects would survive in the apocalypse. Years later, as the mutated hivemother's pincers closed around his neck, he realized how right he was.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Desert Queen
Backstory: The sands of Luxoria are ever shifting. In ancient times, they were ruled by the Scorpid Swarm, and if the ancient Queen Zagara has her way, they shall be once again.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Desert Queen Zagara's banelings, hydralisks, and roachlings have modified models.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Luxoria skins.
Backstory: Abathur's alterations of the Queen essences suppressed their flight in order to improve their abilities to care for the Hive. Of course, this does not extend to Broodmothers.

skins.name:
Archangel of Hope
Backstory: It is through the archangel Auriel that the power of hope flows into the fabric of creation. Her eternal light illuminates even the darkest souls. Seeking harmony in all things, she is a mediator, a counselor, and when the need arises, a fearless warrior.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: It is said that the power of the Nexus amplifies what lies within a warrior's heart. While Auriel's countenance has changed, the light of Hope within her is more resplendent than ever.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Demonic
Backstory: An angel can never truly become a demon. But once the Lord of Hatred corrupted Auriel's spirit and bound it within a mistress of the Burning Hells, most mortals would struggle to tell the difference.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Epic Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. All basic abilities has red colors, Sacred Sweep and Detainment Strike leaves a fire trail, Crystal Aegis places the hero in a Soulstone.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

skins.name:
Faerie Dragon
Backstory: Like many Faerie Dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: The fey magic from which Brightwing draws her power is wild and chaotic. Her very form reflects its unstable nature, ever shifting, like an image from a dream.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Monarch
Backstory: Just like the flawless butterfly from which she takes her name, Monarch Brightwing has many ways to sting. Kneel peasant! For you face the Monarch! And her wrath is cruel...
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Flying Monkey
Backstory: The magical flying creatures of Sky Temple often cause trouble for the locals. It can be hard to run a successful bazaar when your merchandise disappears into thin air.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over, themed abilities. Flying Monkey Brightwing makes monkey noises instead of speaking. She throws bananas when using Arcane Flare, and her Polymorph ability turns enemies into toy monkeys.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Luxoria skins.

skins.name:
Veradani Monk
Backstory: To the monks of Ivgorod, the gods are in all things, and their divine will is proclaimed by the Patriarchs. With unshakable faith, Kharazim carries forth the decrees of the thousand and one gods to the ends of Sanctuary and the realms beyond.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: To the Veradani, the distinction between armor and weaponry is open to interpretation. What can provide defense, can provide offense, if the application is right.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Jade Dragon
Backstory: Wielding Shi'ron's Sacred Flames is an honor given only to the Grandmaster of the Jade Dragon order. In martial combat, Kharazim has no equal--even among the Onyx Empire's Terrorguard.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

skins.name:
World Wanderer
Backstory: Born upon Shen-zin Su, the Wandering Isle, Li Li Stormstout led an uneventful life until she began reading her uncle Chen's journals. Soon, nothing would sate her desire for adventure, exploration, and pestering adventurers around Halfhill.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: When you've wandered as much of the world as Li Li has you learn many things... but perhaps the most important is that it's always wise to carry an umbrella.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Explorer
Backstory: The Explorer's League is known for their progressive stance on accepting members of all races into their ranks. If you've got a heart that longs for adventure and discovery, you're in!
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Festival
Backstory: Each new year brings with it untold promise. It is a joyous time when we honor those who came before us, while celebrating the endless possibilities ahead of us.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Festival Li Li's Cloud Serpent looks like a kite, and her Blinding Wind is more colorful.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

Shadowpaw
Backstory: Not all pandaren were willing to serve as the Thunder King's army of Warmasters. Even now, rumors persist of a rebellion; a resistance born within the shadows.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Basic Attack throws shurikens. Healing Brew leaves a trail of purple smoke and flower petals. Cloud Serpent is purple and wears a ninja headband. Blinding Wind creates purple smoke and throwing stars, and places a paw print above the target's head. Jug of 1,000 Cups creates a black and gold tea set. Water Dragon has a shadowy, black and purple appearance.[3]
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

skins.name:
Combat Medic
Backstory: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion of the Koprulu sector, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: The UED outfits its best soldiers with the finest in experimental ordnance, and its medics are no exception. As such, Lt. Morales’s gear has been upgraded in accordance with her service record.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Apothecary
Backstory: The Royal Apothecary Society's experiments have resulted in many alchemical discoveries, which Apothecary Morales administers to soldiers in the field. Some side effects may occur.
Price: $7.49 / 7.49€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

Love Doctor
Backstory: Whether your heart is broken, bleeding, or located somewhere outside of your body, the Love Doctor will patch you right up.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Her Basic Attack and Healing Beam create pink hearts, her Safeguard shields have pink hearts on them, and she has pink Displacement Grenades that make heart-shaped explosions. Her Stim Drone makes its target pink, while her Medievac Dropship is pink and has a modified cockpit.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

skins.name:
Archdruid
Backstory: Malfurion Stormrage is the greatest druid on Azeroth, and a student of the demi-god Cenarius. Communing with nature and Cenarius through the Emerald dream, Malfurion protects the wilds from demonic influences.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: Malorne the Waywatcher's power transcends death itself. Those who dedicate their lives to fighting for nature carry on his great work.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Storm Mantle
Backstory: Although Broll Bearmantle had saved the Archdruid's life, it had cost him his own. Even now, Malfurion wears his armor to remind himself of the sacrifices that saved Hyjal.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Betrayer
Sargeras's whispers of power were impossible for the broken Malfurion to resist. She had called him "Betrayer"... Soon, they would all call him Master.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. His Moonfire is a fel green, while his Entangling Roots (and the Treant summoned by the Vengeful Roots talent) are dark and corrupted.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative shared history skins.

skins.name:
Shaman of the Earthen Ring
Backstory: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the broken lands of Azeroth.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: Long ago the spirit of Lo'gosh revealed itself to the orc clans of Draenor. To this day his ferocity and feral instincts still serve as a guide to the shaman of the Earthen Ring.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Ironclaw
Backstory: The deal was simple... His life in exchange for training Garrosh's warriors. With their victory in Orgrimmar, Rehgar knew the Iron Horde could only be brought down from within.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Ironclaw Rehgar's Ghost Wolf form is Iron Horde-themed, as are his Earthbind Totems.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Great-father Winter
Backstory: Some people believe that Great-father Winter is just a symbol of commercialization created by Smokeywood Pastures. Those people get coal shoved up their stockings.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€ (only available during Winter Veil event)
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Great-father Winter Rehgar's Ghost Wolf form is reindeer-themed, as are his Earthbind Totems. His Lightning Shield produces snowflakes.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.
skins.price: Price: $9.99 / 8.99€ (only available during Winter Veil event)

skins.name:
Savior of the Templar
Backstory: An Executor without equal, Tassadar has fought tirelessly to purify the Koprulu sector of the zerg infestation. Only now, after learning to wield the power of the void, is Tassadar finally ready to face the Overmind and its all-consuming Swarm.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: Executors rarely command from the field of battle, but their Regalia is fitted with meticulously crafted khaydarin crystals to amplify their psionic powers should the need arise.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Mecha
Backstory: The Kaijo Diablo could not be contained; cities world-wide had been reduced to cinders. Now humanity's survival hangs upon the untested mecha, Tassadar.
Price: $14.99 / 12.99€
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over, themed abilities, themed mount. Mecha Tassadar can Mecha Morph into a jet. His Basic Attack fires missiles, his Plasma Shield has an altered appearance (and different symbols on it), and his Psionic Storm produces crescent-shaped explosions. His Archon form is mecha-themed, and his Force Wall is produced by mechanical generators. He sends out miniature Protoss observers when he uses his Oracle ability.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Kaijo world skins.

Crypt King
Backstory: Pharaoh Ta-sadar knew the power of the darkworld would consume his realm, but Luxoria would still survive... Better the Nexus devour his kingdom than the Scorpid Swarm.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Crypt King Tassadar's Plasma Shield is purple and bears spider symbols. His Psionic Storm produces sand.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Luxoria skins.
Backstory: Mecha Tassadar, mechamorphanize!

skins.name:
High Priestess of Elune
Backstory: Tyrande Whisperwind strikes fear into all who wish ill of the Kaldorei. As the highest ranking Sentinel and High Priestess of Elune, she is not only the Night Elves' most deadly warrior, but also their most cunning leader.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: The vestments of the Sentinel General were blessed by Elune herself. Like the night elves before the World Tree's fall, they do not age and remain as pristine as when they were blessed.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Warden
Backstory: Ever since they were children, Tyrande had known her fate was bound to that of Malfurion's. Now, she would serve as his warden, and for his betrayal the sentence would be eternal.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative shared history skins.

Blood Elf
Backstory: Named for her ancestor, the first Sun Queen, Tyrande Windrunner serves the blood elves as their Ranger General, preparing her people for their pilgrimage into Outland.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Epic Skin Features: Themed Abilities. The Light of Elune is gold and Sentinel summons a phoenix, while Basic Attack, Lunar Flare and Starfall have fiery effects.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Eagle Eye
Backstory: When the Eternal Empire destroyed her home planet, Tyrande Solarwind swore to avenge her fallen people. Her quest has led her to the city of New York in order to eliminate her mortal enemy.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Epic Skin Features: Themed Abilities. Light of Elune, Sentinel, Lunar Flare, and Starfall have comic book-style spell effects. Shadowstalk marks Heroes with a feather above their heads.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Eternal Empire skins.

skins.name:
The Lightbringer
Backstory: The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther the Lightbringer is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master (PvP Paladin set)
Backstory: It's common for the longest serving paladins in the Alliance to still wear their Grand Marshall's Aegis with pride. After all, it takes a lot of honorable kills to purchase that thing.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft tier sets skins.

Lumberjack
Backstory: Arthur Light of British Columbia had barely sipped his coffee when he was dragged into a Nexus portal. Now, he fights alongside the greatest of heroes, hoping to find his way home.
Price: $4.99 / 3.99€

Medic
Backstory: It is said any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Medical Corps officer Uther Lightbringer tends to agree.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Holy Light creates a number of green crosses, Holy Radiance creates a glowing green syringe, and Hammer of Justice drops a hammer shaped like the one he wields.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into StarCraft skins.

Judgement (Tier 2 Paladin set)
Backstory: Despite surviving Arthas's brutal assault, Uther was unable to prevent Lordaeron's fall. Now under Varian's banner he leads the Silver Hand into Northrend to mete out justice.
Price: Available with purchase of the Judgement Bundle or Uther Complete Bundle.
Epic Skin Features: Themed abilities. Holy Light surrounds its target with glowing chains and motes of fire, Holy Radiance conjures a blazing tome, Hammer of Justice drops a burning hammer, Divine Shield protects its target with glowing librams, and Divine Storm briefly leaves a symbol on the ground (a sword overlaid on a libram in a circle of chains).
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft tier sets skins.
skins.price: Price: Available with purchase of the Judgement Bundle or Uther Complete Bundle.

skins.name:
Traitor King
Backstory: Once a proud nerubian king, Anub'arak dared to stand against the Lich King's invasion, but despite his bravery, he too fell to the unrelenting Scourge. Resurrected into undeath, the Traitor King now serves as a towering weapon of destruction.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: A Spider Lord's carapace has been known to deflect blades, arrows, and even siege weaponry all on its own. When fitted with armor, it is all but unstoppable.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Cyb'arak
Backstory: The Defense mecha Cyb'arak designed by Frozen Throne technologies has proven instrumental in the defense of the African continent against the Kaijo monsters.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. The skin has robotic beetles and a drill-based Impale animation.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Kaijo world skins.

Love Bug
Backstory: Once you're bitten, you're smitten.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. The skin has ladybug-like beetles and an Impale animation based on the appearance of the skin's arms.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.
Backstory: In the years following the Third War, Azerothian scholars hypothesized that the wings of spiderlords were vestigal, incapable of flight. They were very wrong.

abilities.name: Shield Overload
abilities.abilityDescription: If you take damage while below 50% Health, gain a 984 (467 + 4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds. Your Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dash
abilities.abilityDescription: Dash forward and deal 125 (60 + 4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Twin Blades
abilities.abilityDescription: Your next Basic Attack immediately causes you to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

abilities.name: Phase Prism
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage to Heroes and swaps your position with theirs.

abilities.name: Purifier Beam
abilities.abilityDescription: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 404 (192 + 4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Suppression Pulse
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

skins.name:
Heirarch of the Daelaam
Backstory: Despite his relative youth, Artanis was named Hierarch of the Daelaam after the fall of Aiur. Driven by the promise of a brighter future, he hopes to reclaim the protoss' fallen home world and rebuild their once glorious civilization.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€, or free with the purchase of StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void.
skins.price: Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€, or free with the purchase of StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void.

skins.name:
Master
Backstory: As Hierarch, Artanis strives for unity among his people. Drawing inspiration from the cultures of both Aiur and Shakuras, his ceremonial armor is a symbol of their combined strength.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Purifier
Backstory: Shortly after reactivation, Artanis purged Aiur of the protoss in an act of open rebellion. Now the Hierarch of the Purifiers leads his people on a quest to cleanse the sector of all organic life.
Price: $7.49 / 7.49€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over.

Shogun
Backstory: The Daelaam Shogunate is not blind to its people's suffering. Artanis, the newly appointed Shogun, has sworn to bring the Lenassa to justice before another clan falls to their dark blades.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Shield Overload appears as a lantern. Blade Dash leaves fire in his wake. Twin Blades gives him burning swords. Phase Prism throws a flaming mask. Purifier Beam drops flaming spears on the target. Suppression Pulse drops a bomb that creates fiery sparks.[8]
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.
