skins.name:
Lich King
Backstory: Once the crown prince of Lordaeron, and protégé of Uther the Lightbringer, Arthas was corrupted by the cursed blade Frostmourne in a desperate bid to save his people. Now he rules over the damned as the Lich King and all shall know his wrath.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: As Frostmourne devoured more and more souls, the Lich King's dominion over the damned grew ever stronger. It wasn't long before his armor began to manifest changes.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Frost Wyrm
Backstory: After the death of the Ashen Verdict's champions none could halt the Lich King's advance. As a reminder of his victory, he grafted the bones of his fallen servants onto his armor.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Crown Prince
Backstory: As his hands gripped the hilt of the cursed blade Frostmourne, a dimensional gateway erupted from the icy pedestal, dragging the young prince Arthas into the Nexus.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over, themed abilities. His Death Coil looks like a lion's head, and the ghouls in his Army of the Dead wear footman armor.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of character's pre-change skins.

Crimson Count
Backstory: Few of Sarah von Kerrigan's suitors are as bold or brash as Marquis Arthas du Menethíl. The Crimson Count hopes their unholy union will spell doom for Raven Court's vampire slayers.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed mount, themed abilities. Death Coil looks like a bat. Frozen Tempest is black and purple and makes bat sounds. Sindragosa is black and red, and his ghouls wear vampire clothes. He gains access to Bat Transformation.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Raven Court skins.

Mystic Kingdoms
Backstory: Revered for his bravery and martial skill, General Arthas has led his king's armies to countless victories. His loyalty knows no bounds, and nothing can make him break his oath of service.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Howling Blast leaves a green line and summons crystals, Summon Sindragosa summons a cloud serpent, and the ghouls in his Army of the Dead wear oriental armor.

Death Knight
Backstory: As the victorious Arthas ascended the Frozen Throne the Lich King's voice echoed through his mind... Without warning, the words pulled away as he found himself in the heart of the Nexus.
Price: N/A (no longer available)

Backstory: Marquis Arthas was never one for intensive study. It is little wonder, then, that his mastery over the power of transformation is somewhat... incomplete. Still, it makes for a fearsome visage.

abilities.name: Fortifying Brew
abilities.abilityDescription: Drink from your keg, gaining 40 Brew and 465 (221 + 4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 1394 (662 + 4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after you stop drinking.

abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.abilityDescription: Kick through target enemy, dealing 246 (117 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Storm
abilities.abilityDescription: Increase the Movement Speede of your spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.abilityDescription: Smash your keg, dealing 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Earth
abilities.abilityDescription: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.abilityDescription: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Fire
abilities.abilityDescription: Increase the Attack Speed of your spirits by 100% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
abilities.abilityDescription: Split into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

abilities.abilityDescription: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

skins.name:
Legendary Brewmaster
Backstory: To be a Brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: The limitless realms of the Nexus are the perfect place for a world-wanderer like Chen Stormstout. Who knows what secret ingredients and lost tales are waiting to be discovered!
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Warmaster
Backstory: The Warmasters serve as the unbreakable front line of Lei Shen's Grand Army. Once the Kaldorei are broken before him, the Well of Eternity will belong to the Thunder King forever.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Warmaster Chen's Wandering Keg looks like the keg he carries.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Lunar
Backstory: The loremasters say that coins are a symbol of fortune and luck. During the Lunar Festival, elders hand out Coins of Ancestry to those who seek them out and pay their respects.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Lunar Chen's Breath of Fire has a stylized animation, and his Wandering Keg looks like the keg he carries.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

skins.name:
Primal Pack Leader
Backstory: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the esence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 9.99€

Master
Backstory: To the primal zerg, form and function are one. With each change comes greater strength, and thus survival. Few have undergone as much change as Dehaka... and he intends to keep it that way.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Mecha
Backstory: Zerus-class mech D3-H4K4 was developed to gather Kaijo DNA mid-combat. Troublingly, the onboard AI has begun rejecting orders, extracting "essence" from its own targets.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. Drag uses an electrified tongue, Dark Swarm creates spinning blades, Isolation launches a machine onto the target, and different parts of him glow when using Adaptation.[5]
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Kaijo world skins.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone
abilities.abilityDescription: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed, or 1 per Minion or captured Mercenary. For each Soul, gain .20% maximum Health. If you have 100 Souls upon dying, you resurrect in 5 seconds and lose 100 Souls. Maximum 100 Souls.

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.abilityDescription: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 206 (98 + 4% per level) damage, and then stunning them for 0.5 seconds. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second instead.

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.abilityDescription: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 233 (111 + 4% per level) damage each.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.abilityDescription: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 160 (76 + 4% per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Apocalypse
abilities.abilityDescription: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Breath
abilities.abilityDescription: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 1753 (832 + 4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

skins.name:
Lord of Terror
Backstory: Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his gender... malleable.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: The heroes thought shattering his soulstone on the Hellforge would end his reign. Now, adorned with the forge's remnants, he would shatter every bone in their bodies in return.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Kaijo
Backstory: The scientists of Tristram Labs had grown overconfident. They believed the power of the atom was finally under their control. They were wrong.
Price: $4.99 / 3.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Kaijo world skins.

Lurkablo
Backstory: It is with hushed whispers the fishermen of Stormwind speak of the Lord of the Depths. His very name an eternal curse upon any angler foolish enough to speak it aloud: Lurkablo.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

Archangel
Backstory: Bringing a whole new meaning to "Holy Terror."
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. The flames created by Fire Stomp and the Fire Devil talent are blue, as are the effects of Apocalypse and Lightning Breath.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.
Backstory: See Diablo. See Diablo run. Wait... since when can Diablo run? Run from Diablo! Run!!!

skins.name:
Rock God
Backstory: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.
Price: 2,000 / $3.99 / 3.49€

Master
Backstory: Some bands paint their faces and play death metal. E.T.C. however, IS death metal.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Glam Metal
Backstory: The Elite Tauren Chieftan has been rocking the world for a long time, man. He's seen fashions come and fashions go, but neon pants and feathered hair? Those are forever.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Pure Country
Backstory: After E.T.C's pickup truck broke down and his dog died there was really only one thing left for him to do-- go country! Time to bring a whole new meaning to cowboy.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Epic Skin Features: Themed abilities. Pure Country E.T.C.'s abilities have different sound effects.

skins.name:
Crusader of Zakarum
Backstory: There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: The crusader's armor is an emblem of their identity. Over the centuries it is constantly molded and reshaped to fit the needs and personality of its current master.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Centurion
Backstory: At Emperor Severus's command, an entire legion marched against the portal of the gods. All but one returned home, a single centurion taken as punishment for man's hubris.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€

Spellbreaker
Backstory: While most spellbreakers serve in defense of Quel'thalas, Johanna has embarked on a crusade to purify the lands of Lordaeron, instead. She will not rest until her homeland is restored.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. All abilities have a blood elven theme.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.abilityDescription: Become a ghost when you die, and resurrect upon reaching full Health. Your Abilities and Talents don't do damage while dead, but will still heal you for 50% of their normal amount, causing you to cheat death.

abilities.name: Ghastly Swing
abilities.abilityDescription: Swing in front of you to slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.abilityDescription: Swing in front of you to deal 255 (121 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. Deals double damage to non-Heroes and non-Structures.

abilities.name: Drain Essence
abilities.abilityDescription: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit healing you for up to 12.5% of your maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as you remain close to the enemy. You drain more essence the longer you remain connected.

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.abilityDescription: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing you for up to 20% of your maximum Health while you are nearby, over 4 seconds. You are slowed by 20% while this is active.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.abilityDescription: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.abilityDescription: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: March of the Black King
abilities.abilityDescription: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 401 (191 + 4% per level) damage.

talents.name:
Mana Thirst
Skeletal Swing restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.
Hopelessness
Increases the range of Drain Hope by 20%.
Block
Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.
Reanimation
You can gather Regeneration Globes while Undying. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Glove increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Globes, you also respawn 10 seconds faster.

skins.name:
Skeleton King
Backstory: Madness. Betrayal. Death. These are the legacy of the Black King Leoric's reign. Driven to madness by the spirit of Diablo, Leoric brought untold suffering on his kingdom. Even after his death there was no release for the Skeleton King.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: These ornamental warplates were once a symbol of the holy Zakarum faith. Now, they serve only as a stark reminder of its demonic corruption.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Vrykul
Backstory: Leoric held the Winterskorn Chieftain's skull aloft for the gathering crowd to see. "Who else among you wishes to challenge me?" The silence was deafening.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into Warcraft skins.

Space Lord
Backstory: The Space Lord has brought countless worlds under the Eternal Empire's thrall. Soon, even Earth's troublesome Star Princess will fall to the power of the darkness.
Price: $14.99 / 14.99€
Skin Features: Replaced voice-over, themed abilities, custom portrait.[3] All of the Space Lord's abilities have holographic/technological animations and sound effects. He generates red, purple, or green energy depending on the tint used.[4]
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Eternal Empire skins.

skins.name:
Mountain King
Backstory: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent his corruption. After recovering from a mild case of amnesia, he is now the leader of the Bronzebeard clan after the "diamond-ization" of his brother the King Magni.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: To siege Icecrown, the Ashen Verdict forged the most powerful armors crafted by man... Meanwhile, Muradin stole a Ymirjar Lord's armor, and kicked everyone's arse.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)
Master Skin Features: Themed abilities. Master Muradin's avatar form is made of gold.

Magni
Backstory: It was hard for Magni to accept Moira as member of the Council of Three Hammers, but he knew his deceased brother Muradin would have wanted peace in Ironforge.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Storm Bolt, Thunder Clap, and Dwarf Toss have fiery, lava-themed animations. Magni's avatar form is made of diamond.

Kandy King
Backstory: Everyone wants to be King of Kandy Mountain... but once a Gummy Dragon shows up, they flee to Sugar Plum Valley like the rest. Heavy is the head that wears the cupcake crown.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. The Kandy King's avatar form is made of chocolate.

skins.name:
Champion of the Horde
Backstory: It was a strange twist of fate that led the wandering half-ogre Rexxar to the fledgling city of Orgrimmar. With his aid, Thrall and the Horde were able to secure their homeland and defend it from the invading forces of Lord Admiral Daelin Proudmoore.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: A beastmaster is at one with the wilds. When they kill, they ensure every part of the animal is made use of.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Frostlord
Backstory: When the Crystal Citadel fell, the Frostlords were scattered and never heard from again. Legend holds that some still wander the frozen tundras of the north, ever searching for a new home.
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Frostlord Rexxar's bear, hawk, and boars are ice-themed.

Raider
Backstory: The terrans are descended from Earth's exiled prisoners, mutants, and degenerates. Some, like the military ursine-handler Cpl. Rex Arkk, are more genetically aberrant than others.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of other franchises merging into StarCraft skins.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.abilityDescription: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.abilityDescription: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing 380 (180 + 4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.abilityDescription: Deals 421 (200 + 4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 106 (50 + 4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.abilityDescription: Deals 875 (415 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 20% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.abilityDescription: Leap into the air, dealing 270 (128 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
abilities.abilityDescription: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

skins.name:
Wandering Barbarian
Backstory: From the frozen Dreadlands of the north come the mighty Barbarian warriors. After surviving the destruction of her home and death of her tribe, Sonya wanders Sanctuary in search of battle and a better life for her people.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: The Valor of Harrogath is not opulent armor... It is simple, direct... and a perfect fit for warrior like Sonya.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Wrath (Tier 2 Warrior set)
Backstory: The portal-loving treasure goblins collect spoils from many worlds. There's no telling which hero this Battlegear of Wrath once belonged to, but they're probably not alive to miss it.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Warcraft tier sets skins.

Super
Backstory: While traveling through time, the gladiatrix Sonya was exposed to a radioactive robo-virus. Without a way home, she fights tirelessly to keep the streets of New York safe.
Price: $9.99 / 9.99€
Skin Features: Themed Abilities. Ancient Spear, Seismic Slam, and Whirlwind have comic book-style animations.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of Earth vs Mars skins.

abilities.name: Vile Gas
abilities.abilityDescription: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that persists for 4 seconds. Enemies who enter it are poisoned for 40 (19 + 4% per level) damage per second for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Hook
abilities.abilityDescription: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, temporarily stunning them and dealing 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.abilityDescription: Deal 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage to Minions or 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 19.92% of your maximum Health.

abilities.name: Putrid Bile
abilities.abilityDescription: Emit bile that deals 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Gorge
abilities.abilityDescription: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

skins.name:
Terror of Darkshire
Backstory: Take care when traversing the shadowed trails of Duskwood... Ever since Abercrombie the Embalmer unleashed his vile abomination upon Darkshire, Stitches has wandered the road aimlessly, hungering for the flesh of low level Alliance players.
Price: 7,000 / $8.49 / 8.49€

Master
Backstory: Stitches no bozo... Stitches king!
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Psycho
Backstory: The Crystal Lake of Elwynn Forest hides a horrifying secret beneath the depths of its murky waters...
Price: $7.49 / 6.49€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Psycho Stitches throws a mining pick on a rope when using his Hook ability.

Chef
Backstory: What? Everybody needs a day job... Just don't order the "veal."
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Chef Stitches throws a bent fork on a length of sausage when using his Hook ability, and chunks of meat go flying when he uses Slam.

Bikini
Backstory: Splish-splash! Hot and ready for the summer sun, Bikini Stitches is off to meet the ghoul of his dreams... that and make a sandcastle!
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€, also Included with the purchase of the Lil' Stitches Plush.[3]
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Bikini Stitches throws a plastic bucket when he uses Hook, and produces sand when he uses Devour.
skins.price: Price: $9.99 / 8.99€, also Included with the purchase of the Lil' Stitches Plush.[3]

skins.name:
Greatfather Winter
Backstory: The feast of Great-Winter is a magical time of year. It seems like everyone is getting into that Winter Veil spirit! Even if we kinda wish they wouldn't...
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities. Hook throws a candy cane attached to a line of lights, Slam has a different impact animation and knocks decorations from his tree, and Putrid Bile drops ornaments and plays music.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of holiday skins.

skins.name:
Archangel of Justice
Backstory: Among the angels it is the Archangel of Justice Tyrael who is humanity's greatest defender. Wielding his sword El'druin against the Burning Hells, the Prime Evils would have enslaved humanity long ago if Tyrael had not intervened.
Price: 4,000 / $6.49 / 6.49€

Master
Backstory: Each archangel's armor is a manifestation of their spirit. While his appearance had changed during his battles within the Nexus, his dedication to justice remained steadfast.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Seraphim
Backstory: With tired eyes the newly appointed High Seraph Tyrael looked across Sanctuary... after the fall of the High Heavens, this world was the last bastion against Imperius's wrath.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

Demonic
Backstory: Of all the Aspects of Sin, Tyrael, the Lord of Pride, is the most ruthless. His every action and every thought serves only to fulfill the desires of his true master: himself.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Altered voice-over, themed abilities. El'Druin's Might reflects the altered appearance of his sword, and Smite creates an image of Diablo rather than an angelic rune.
Note: This skin theme is part of a shared theme of alternative history skins.

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.abilityDescription: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 22 (11 + 4% per level) damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 2.5 per second.

abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.abilityDescription: Launch a particle grenade that deals 156 (74 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.abilityDescription: Gain a shield that absorbs 1228 (583 + 4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.abilityDescription: Grants an allied Hero a shield that absorbs 921 (437 + 4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.abilityDescription: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Expulsion Zone
abilities.abilityDescription: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 272 (129 + 4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

talents.name:

skins.name:
Defender of Russia
Backstory: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.
Price: 10,000 / $9.99 / 8.99€

Master
Backstory: The Tobelstein Reactor is an emergent technology, and its full potential has yet to be tapped. Rumor has it that the Gravitic Harness is the next great advancement in energy projection.
Price: 10,000 (requires Hero Level 10)

Thunder Guard
Backstory: Armed with their Mjolnir Cannons, Zarya Aleksdottir and the Thunder Guard serve as the Midgard megalopolis' last defense against the Jotunheim Republic and their frost golem army.
Price: $9.99 / 8.99€
Skin Features: Themed abilities.
